scripts.build2: yarn --cwd solita solita && yarn --cwd sdk tsc && yarn --cwd app build
scripts.libreplex:deploy:devnet: anchor build -p libreplex && anchor deploy -p libreplex --provider.cluster https://api.devnet.solana.com --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/libreplex-deployer.json
scripts.libreplex:deploy:mainnet: anchor build -p libreplex && anchor deploy -p libreplex --provider.cluster  https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com --provider.wallet ~/.config/solana/libreplex-deployer.json
